item.title: An Arabish lesson: Introducing Django to the foreign world
item.description:
Description

Bashar Al-Abdulhadi

Sharing ideas why should developers work on translation/internationalization of their packages, why it's important for Django to spread when there are more languages for it and sharing some real world experience in this field.
item.dc:creator: Bashar Al-Abdulhadi

item.title: Introducing Django To The Foreign World
item.description:
Description

You can find more about this talk on djangocon.eu. This video is hosted by opbeat.com.
